xml_woarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_WOARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_WOARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #ifdef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00021 #error "wide char i/o not supported on this platform"
00022 #else
00023 
00024 #include <cstddef> // size_t
00025 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00026 namespace std{ 
00027     using ::size_t; 
00028 } // namespace std
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #include <ostream>
00032 
00033 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_warchive.hpp>
00034 #include <boost/archive/basic_text_oprimitive.hpp>
00035 #include <boost/archive/basic_xml_oarchive.hpp>
00036 
00037 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00038 
00039 namespace boost {
00040 namespace archive {
00041 
00042 #if 0
00043 BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(std::wostream &)
00044 operator<<(std::wostream &os, const char *t);
00045 
00046 BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(std::wostream &)
00047 operator<<(std::wostream &os, const char t);
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 template<class Archive>
00051 class xml_woarchive_impl : 
00052     public basic_text_oprimitive<std::wostream>,
00053     public basic_xml_oarchive<Archive>
00054 {
00055 #ifdef BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00056 public:
00057 #else
00058     friend class detail::interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00059     friend class basic_xml_oarchive<Archive>;
00060     friend class save_access;
00061 protected:
00062 #endif
00063     //void end_preamble(){
00064     //    basic_xml_oarchive<Archive>::end_preamble();
00065     //}
00066     template<class T>
00067     void 
00068     save(const T & t){
00069         basic_text_oprimitive<std::wostream>::save(t);
00070     }
00071     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00072     save(const char * t);
00073     #ifndef BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00074     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void) 
00075     save(const wchar_t * t);
00076     #endif
00077     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void) 
00078     save(const std::string &s);
00079     #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00080     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00081     save(const std::wstring &ws);
00082     #endif
00083     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00084     xml_woarchive_impl(std::wostream & os, unsigned int flags);
00085     ~xml_woarchive_impl(){}
00086 public:
00087     void 
00088     save_binary(const void *address, std::size_t count){
00089         this->end_preamble();
00090         #if ! defined(__MWERKS__)
00091         this->basic_text_oprimitive<std::wostream>::save_binary(
00092         #else
00093         this->basic_text_oprimitive::save_binary(
00094         #endif
00095             address, 
00096             count
00097         );
00098         this->indent_next = true;
00099     }
00100 };
00101 
00102 // we use the following because we can't use
00103 // typedef xml_woarchive_impl<xml_woarchive_impl<...> > xml_woarchive;
00104 
00105 // do not derive from this class.  If you want to extend this functionality
00106 // via inhertance, derived from xml_woarchive_impl instead.  This will
00107 // preserve correct static polymorphism.
00108 class xml_woarchive : 
00109     public xml_woarchive_impl<xml_woarchive>
00110 {
00111 public:
00112     xml_woarchive(std::wostream & os, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00113         xml_woarchive_impl<xml_woarchive>(os, flags)
00114     {}
00115     ~xml_woarchive(){}
00116 };
00117 
00118 typedef xml_woarchive naked_xml_woarchive;
00119 
00120 } // namespace archive
00121 } // namespace boost
00122 
00123 // required by export
00124 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_REGISTER_ARCHIVE(boost::archive::xml_woarchive)
00125 
00126 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00127 
00128 #endif // BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00129 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_OARCHIVE_HPP
